item.title: Our First Sex Doll
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: A HUGE thanks to the team at Silicone Wives for thinking of us and sending us one of their ladies. It was exciting getting to try one of these out! I think a large part of the appeal of Alabama (and high end sex dolls in general) is all about the website and presentation of […]
item.content:encoded:
Our First Sex Doll

by Matthew Nolan on 03/05/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Couples Toys ¬ª
  • Favorites ¬ª
  • Penis Toys ¬ª
  • Review Comics




A HUGE thanks to the team at Silicone Wives for thinking of us and sending us one of their ladies. It was exciting getting to try one of these out!

I think a large part of the appeal of Alabama (and high end sex dolls in general) is all about the website and presentation of the dolls. So before I go chitty-chatting I really encourage you to check out the Silicone Wives website. They take incredible photos and tell backstories about the ladies they sell. Seeing these almost lifelike and expertly done photos breathes life into them, beyond the frozen figure you get in the mail.

Edit:
Before you go clicking the link to Silicone Wives, heads up: some of the copy on their site is‚Ä¶ not very respectful towards women. So click if you‚Äôre interested, but be ready for text that is marketing to a different sort of crowd than we normally cater to here.

  • Silicone Wives
  • Alabama

We've got a new addition to our family üíû pic.twitter.com/RT2vGtm2af

‚Äî Erika Moen üêå ECCC H15 (@ErikaMoen) December 19, 2018

(a couple of other photo‚Äôs here! and here!)

Some tips I DID pick up on: A sex doll is COLD, you need to buy a heated blanket to put over her before getting intimate. Also, if you get a model with an in-built vulva (Like Alabama!), use Internal Condoms to save on having to wash her out afterwards. There‚Äôs also a SUPER helpful How To Use A Sex Doll guide on the website that‚Äôs very much a must-read if you‚Äôre about to shell out for a $2k toy.

Also, a big thing I didn‚Äôt talk about in the comic is that it‚Äôs nearly impossible to recycle a TPE sex doll. There ARE some places that‚Äôll take TPE, but it‚Äôs difficult and hard to find, and the idea of chopping her up for the recycle plant is just gruesome. Because of that and the high prices, there is a thriving second-hand market out there. Which brings me to my next announcement‚Ä¶

If you‚Äôre in the Portland area and are interested in buying our once-used* Alabama for like $500, drop me an email. I would love for her to find a good local forever-home.
*Used with an internal condom, she never came into contact with any bodily fluids.

And on a completely different note‚Ä¶.
Next week, we‚Äôre heading out for the Emerald City Comic Convention!
Come find us if you‚Äôre in Seattle 14-17th in the Artist Alley, Booth H12! We‚Äôll be doing a couple of signing and panels too.

Friday 15th 1-2 Oni Booth ‚Äì Drawn to Sex Signing
Sat 16th 6.30-7.30 TCC L3-R2 Lucy Bellwood and Erika Moen host, Too Boat, Too Boner.
Sun 17th 2-3 Oni Booth ‚Äì Drawn to Sex Signing

‚îî Tags: Alabama, review, Sex Doll, Silicone Wives, TPE Doll

item.content:encoded:
Bilateral Salpingectomy by Rosalarian

by Matthew Nolan on 02/26/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Education Comics ¬ª
  • Guest Comics ¬ª
  • Guest Education ¬ª
  • Health

So many thank-yous to to Rosalarin for sharing her personal story about sterilization with all of us today! A longtime veteran in the queer indie comics world (AND MORE), make sure you check out her current project, Spectacle.

  • Rosalarian.com
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Facebook
  • Gumroad

Reminders on a few things:
‚ô• Our pals over at Pink and White (the team that makes Crash Pad <3 ) have a Indigogo for a new film they are making. We‚Äôve chipped in with unique illustrated bookplate copy of Drawn to Sex: The Basics. (That means a copy of the book that comes with an original drawing on the bookplate). We don‚Äôt sell these outside of our semi-yearly Kickstarter, so grab it while it‚Äôs hot and support a good team with their film!

‚ô• We‚Äôll be at Seattle‚Äôs Emerald City Comic Con in Seattle March 14-17th. Come by and say hi! We‚Äôll be in booth H12 with Helioscope in the Artist Alley!

‚ô• Finally, our sponsors over at OMGYes are still in the middle of collecting data for their next series/research paper. If you haven‚Äôt already discovered OMGYes, check out our review. We LOVE them and would love it if you helped support their work with this survey. It takes about 20 min, but puts you in for a good chance to win a $100 gift card to Good Vibrations. Check it out:

OMGyes and Researchers at Indiana University School of Medicine are studying how people use sex toys for pleasure! Share your preferences in a survey to help researchers better understand specific sexual behaviors related to sex toys. If you qualify, the survey takes about 20 minutes to complete. After completing the survey, you can enter a raffle for one (1) of Ten (10) $100 Good Vibrations gift cards.

Survey here

Next week is my sex doll review. Wish me luck 0_o.

‚îî Tags: Bilateral Salpingectomy, birth control, education, fallopian tubes, guest, guest comic, Rosalarian, sterilization

Whoooops! Here […]
item.content:encoded:
Anus Anatomy

by Erika Moen on 02/19/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Education Comics ¬ª
  • Health

We were looking over our list of done topics for the next Drawn to Sex book (all about health), and it turned out that while we‚Äôve gone in-depth on how to fill up and stimulate a butt hole, we had completely forgotten to do an Anus Anatomy 101 comic in the first place. Whoooops!

Here are some other anal comics for you to poke around in:
‚Äì Prepare Your Booty for Anal.
‚Äì How to have Anal Sex!
‚Äì Anal Toys We‚Äôve Reviewed!

Last Friday we visited Seattle to do a presentation at my high school AND our book signing at my very first sex shop, Babeland. Both events were amazing and really‚Ä¶ reaffirming. It‚Äôs easy to get tunnel vision and forget the value of what we‚Äôre doing while we‚Äôre doing it. We got to see so many of you who helped turn that around with your kind words and support. If you turned up for either event ‚Äì thank you! I wrote a bit more intimately about the experience on Patreon.

ALSO, our sponsors over at OMGYes are in the middle of collecting data for their next series/research paper. If you haven‚Äôt already discovered OMGYes, check out our review. We LOVE them and would love it if you helped support their work with this survey.
It takes about 20 min, but puts you in for a good chance to win a $100 gift card. Check it out:

OMGyes and Researchers at Indiana University School of Medicine are studying how people use sex toys for pleasure! Share your preferences in a survey to help researchers better understand specific sexual behaviors related to sex toys. If you qualify, the survey takes about 20 minutes to complete. After completing the survey, you can enter a raffle for one (1) of Ten (10) $100 Good Vibrations gift cards.

Survey here

‚îî Tags: anal, anatomy, anus, education, prostate, rectum, skene's gland

I fell in love with her Instagram comics a while ago and feel super honored to have gotten a full length story like this from her here. Instagram Portfolio Patreon Gumroad That’s our third porn-y comic in a […]
item.content:encoded:
100 Percent by Michelle Lam

by Matthew Nolan on 02/12/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Guest Comics ¬ª
  • Guest Smutty Comics ¬ª
  • Guest Story Comics

Happy Valentine‚Äôs, everybody!

Here is a cute sexy comic from Michelle Lam for you all to enjoy.
I fell in love with her Instagram comics a while ago and feel super honored to have gotten a full length story like this from her here.

  • Instagram
  • Portfolio
  • Patreon
  • Gumroad

That‚Äôs our third porn-y comic in a row, you lucky devils, you! I hope it‚Äôs been a fun change of pace for you all. Most of the time I don‚Äôt get to plan out which comics go up when ‚Äì especially when we‚Äôre posting guest comics. Our scheduling is a first come first serve sort of thing. So it‚Äôs just been a happy coincidence that you all get porn for your Valentine‚Äôs =D

Next week we‚Äôre going knee deep back into the sex education minesm with hopefully a review or two shortly after. As always, if you continue to enjoy our work or the work of those we hire, consider dropping us a buck or two on patreon! It keeps us doing what we doooo and able to pay others for what they do too.

Seattle is SNOWED IN, so right this second we‚Äôre not sure if it‚Äôll be safe to drive up in our tiny car. If you‚Äôre thinking of attending our book signing, the best place to stay up to date is over on Erika and my Twitters. But obviously ‚Äì don‚Äôt go out if it‚Äôs dangerous! The deets on the book signing can be found here: The DAY AFTER valentines in Seattle‚Äôs Babeland store! Feb 15th 7pm at Babeland!

‚îî Tags: guest, guest comic, michelle lam, vibrator

item.title: Filthy Figments
item.dc:creator: Matthew Nolan
item.description: Happy Tuesday folks! Your almost half way through the week, you can do it! This comic’s been a long time coming. We’ve had Gina’s Filthy Figments on our radar from the very start of OJST, so I’m super happy to have finally found our way into getting a review done. We hope you guys like […]
item.content:encoded:
Filthy Figments

by Matthew Nolan on 02/05/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Porn & Websites ¬ª
  • Review Comics

Happy Tuesday folks! Your almost half way through the week, you can do it!

This comic‚Äôs been a long time coming. We‚Äôve had Gina‚Äôs Filthy Figments on our radar from the very start of OJST, so I‚Äôm super happy to have finally found our way into getting a review done. We hope you guys like it. Filthy Figments is a really wonderful site. A den of devilishly dirty comics made by a ton of different artists set at a reasonable price. Even its UI issues just make it feel nostalgically 90‚Äôs.

With Valentines around the corner, we‚Äôre totes recommending you pick up a month and dive into their archives. It‚Äôs the perfect late night tablet companion in my opinion.

  • Filthy Figments

While your off exploring FF, try not to forget that Erika and I are doing a signing the DAY AFTER valentines in Seattle‚Äôs Babeland store! Feb 15th 7pm at Babeland!

As way of a quick update: things are progressing on our two book projects (Book Two of Drawn to Sex, and our Random House book Let‚Äôs Talk About It), but gosh are we worn out! We‚Äôre doing one week at a time on each project with out much in the way of breaks. And then this week we both got slammed by a Portland plague. We struggled to get today‚Äôs comic done in time! But despite that, we‚Äôre both still having a bunch of fun with the work? Oh Joy Sex Toy‚Äôs been a homely pleasure to come back to and work on each week, and to hire guests for. While the Random House book has been a exciting and new project that‚Äôs driving us forward. Next week we‚Äôve got another cute porny guest comic (I know right, a lot of horny ones in a row, just in time for Valentines ‚Äì it‚Äôs just how it turned out I swear) and then after that, an educational one if we recover quick!

Drop us a buck on Patreon if you want to support what we do here! Every dollar keeps us alive and going. ESPECIALLY this year, when we‚Äôre not planning a Kickstarter (Drawn to Sex Book Two will be Kickstarted in 2020, once we‚Äôve covered a few more subjects!)

‚îî Tags: Apollo-pop, Bramblefix, C.C., Cinna, Dante L, filthy figments, Gina Biggs, H. Pueyo, Mawar, Molly Ostertag, porn, pornography, Sonia Liao

item.content:encoded:
A Sweet Distress by S.W.Searle

by Matthew Nolan on 01/29/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Guest Comics ¬ª
  • Guest Smutty Comics

This week, Sarah Winifred Searle is BACK!
This time with a really sweet comic based around some of her other characters. You might remember Sarah‚Äôs previous comics on OJST here (covering a range from hair to body image and weight). Today she‚Äôs made us a delicately sexy comic, one that might need some context:

From Sarah: The comic hints at a bigger, more intimate relationship between Milly and Thorburn, one that originated before they came to both work with the department store. If you‚Äôre interested in learning more about them, keep an eye out for an appearance in future chapters of Sparks!

I got super excited when Sarah brought this to the table. It sounded super sweet, and Erika and I are suckers for this sort of shy-coy-and-horny Downton Abbey type scenario. If you‚Äôre looking for MORE about this particular world, Mrs. Thorburn, and Milly. Check out FilthyFigments (a sexy web-comic porn site that we‚Äôre hoping to review next week!), and look for the Sparks story. According to Sarah, it updates with 10 new pages each month =D AND bonus BONUS info: apparently it‚Äôs being collected into an Iron Circus Book in 2020 too!!! =D

  • Swinsea.com
  • Patreon
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

We are now TWO weeks away from our Seattle book signing. If you are in town please come out and say hi! It would mean the world to us. Feb 15th 7pm at Babeland!

For those of you who aren‚Äôt near Seattle, and still, want to show support for what we do here. Let me suggest our Patreon =D Each comic is made with the help of tiny dollar supporters there, and in turn, we try and post behind the scenes stuff!

‚îî Tags: fantasy, fiction, guest, guest comic, Milly, porn, pornography, power dynamic, searle, Sparks, SWS, tease, Thorburn

Don’t fancy yourself a permanent form […]
item.content:encoded:
Vasectomy

by Matthew Nolan on 01/22/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Education Comics ¬ª
  • Health

A huge thank you to Carlos who was game to share his vasectomy story with me this week!

As mentioned at the end of the comic, there‚Äôs still lots of info about vasectomies out there that warrant further research if you‚Äôre contemplating it. Take a peek at Planned Parenthood.

Don‚Äôt fancy yourself a permanent form of birth control? We‚Äôve covered several other forms here (but not all of them, of course!). Hopefully, soon we‚Äôll have comics on tubular ligation and bilateral salpingectomy for those of you with uteruses.

Since we‚Äôre weeks away from Valentine‚Äôs Day, it‚Äôs worth reminding you all that our best-sex-toys of the year list can be found here, and if you are looking for a store to shop with, well, we love ALL the ones we list on our site: seriously, I‚Äôve not been swapping any of them out these past few years, because they are all wonderful people with ace stores.

ALSO, the day AFTER valentine‚Äôs, Erika and I will be in SEATTLE doing a book signing at Babeland!!! Check it out here.

‚îî Tags: balls, birth control, cock, contraception, dick, education, permanent, scrotum, snip, vas deferens, vasectomy

Hope you enjoy today‚Äôs comic! As we start the new year, I think it‚Äôs worth mentioning afresh that we‚Äôre only able to hire and make comics like this because of the support of our Patrons. Thank you for helping us each week and for making this possible!

But honestly we started this week building our list, and by the time we had whittled it down to something that would fit, it was 90% […]
item.content:encoded:
Best Things of 2018

by Matthew Nolan on 01/08/2019 at 12:01 am
  • Comic ¬ª
  • Favorites ¬ª
  • Review Comics

Looking for our Best Sex Toy List?CLICK HERE!

(Previous years here: 2016, 2015, 2014)

Ok, so some of you might be thinking that we wimped out of a best-of-sex-toy-list. But honestly we started this week building our list, and by the time we had whittled it down to something that would fit, it was 90% of the same things like last years. The thing is, we haven‚Äôt reviewed all that many new toys this year, and we‚Äôre still deeply in love with a lot of oldies. Our focus this year has been on hiring lots of new voices for OJST, and getting as much health education in as possible for our next book!

That all being said, we still wanted to share something with you all. So here is our comic about the stuff that made 2018 bearable, the stuff that helped us and made us smile. Whether it be golden climbing shoes, Hilda or furry smut.

Before I dive into links to specific things, here is our current sex toy store line up. We love them all, so if you‚Äôre here looking for a toy, visit these stores! They won‚Äôt disappoint, especially the smaller personally curated ones!

Check out our Friends (With Benefits) Stores

  • USA
  • UK
  • EU
  • AUS
  • CAN
  • Early to Bed
  • Good Vibes
  • Lovehoney
  • Babeland
  • PleasureChest
  • SheBop
  • Tantus
  • Vibrant*
  • Stockroom
  • Fun Factory
  • TwistedMonk
  • Fleshlight
Lovehoney also has a discount code for 15% off!
Stockroom ALSO has a 15% discount for you, just add ‚ÄòOHJOY‚Äô at checkout!
PleasureChest has a 15% discount for you to use too! Add ‚ÄòOJST‚Äô at checkout!
